trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged> event occurs when a property value of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by one of the following properties changes:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged>屬性值時，就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>其中下列的屬性變更傳回的物件：

trans-unit.source: If one of these properties is set to a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object, however, the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event occurs but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged> event does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果其中一個屬性會設定為不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>物件，對應*PropertyName* `Changed`就會發生事件，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged>事件不會發生。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyleScope%2A> property to determine which property has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> that changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyleScope%2A>屬性來判斷哪一個屬性具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>變更。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property to retrieve the updated value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>屬性來擷取更新的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the changed <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得已變更的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The changed <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 已變更的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve the updated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> property value.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性用於擷取更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyleScope%2A> property to determine which property has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> that changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyleScope%2A>屬性來判斷哪一個屬性具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>變更。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the scope that is affected by the changed cell style.
trans-unit.target: 取得受變更的儲存格樣式所影響的範圍。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleScopes" /> that indicates which <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> entity owns the cell style that changed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleScopes" />，表示哪一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 實體擁有已變更的儲存格樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyleScope%2A> property to determine which property has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> that changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyleScope%2A>屬性來判斷哪一個屬性具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>變更。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property to retrieve the updated value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>屬性來擷取更新的值。
